topic: Deep dive: _tkinter standard library module in Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: Deep dive: _tkinter standard library module in Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: _tkinter Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer delves into the enhanced features and improvements of the _tkinter module in Python 3.11 and 3.12.
key_points: Improved performance due to refactoring and optimizations.
New Tkinter.ttk widgets such as Progressbar, Notebook, and Combobox.
Support for themed widgets with the new ttkthemes module.

code_examples.code:
from tkinter import ttk
root = tk.Tk()
progressbar = ttk.Progressbar(root, length=200, mode='indeterminate')
progressbar.pack(pady=10)
root.mainloop()

version_notes: Python 3.12: Introduction of new Tkinter.ttk widgets and ttkthemes support.
caveats: _tkinter is not backward-compatible with previous versions of Python, so consider using platform-specific bindings for older systems.
Ensure you have the ttkthemes package installed to use themed widgets.
